characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: ALAITOC INFANTRY model only. Your opponent must subtract 1 from their rolls for attacks that target the bearer in the Shooting phase. In addition, during deployment, you may set up this model in hiding instead of placing it on the battlefield. At the end of your fist Movement phase, this model steps out from hiding - set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" from any enemy models.
